Post-Match Reflections: Pakistan captain Babar Azam: 'The pitch is not easy to bat on. It was a little bit two-paced.'
Bangladesh skipper Shakib Al Hasan: 'Of course at the halfway stage we wanted to get somewhere between 145 runs. That would've been more reasonable.'
Player of the match Shaheen Shah Afridi: 'It's not easy to come back after injury and bowl I am just trying to bowl my best.'
Shaheen Afridi has been named Player of the Match for his superb 4-22.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India through to the semi-final thanks to South Africa defeat
South Africa defeat by Netherlands puts them out of the tournament
If India beat Zimbabwe then India will face England in a semi-final at the Adelaide Oval and Pakistan will face New Zealand at the SCG on Wednesday.
If Zimbabwe beat India then England will play Pakistan on Thursday and it will be India v New Zealand on Wednesday.
Others: The cricket doesn't stop though! Our live coverage of India v Zimbabwe is just getting under way here.
We will hear what he has to say very shortly.
The game goes on. Trying to finish in style but it's straight into the hands of the fielder.
Pakistan are potentially one blow away from the win.
Celebrations are muted for Bangladesh because they know what their fate is.
There's going to be some noise around this stadium.
